description: Detects suspicious Windows Error Reporting manager (wermgr.exe) child process
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
name: Suspicious Child Process Of Wermgr.EXE
query: (event.category:process AND process.parent.executable:/.*\\[Ww][Ee][Rr][Mm][Gg][Rr]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND process.executable:(/.*\\[Cc][Mm][Dd]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Cc][Ss][Cc][Rr][Ii][Pp][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ii][Pp][Cc][Oo][Nn][Ff][Ii][Gg]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Mm][Ss][Hh][Tt][Aa]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Nn][Ee][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Nn][Ee][Tt]1\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Nn][Ee][Tt][Ss][Tt][Aa][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Nn][Ss][Ll][Oo][Oo][Kk][Uu][Pp]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr][Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll]\_[Ii][Ss][Ee]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr][Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Pp][Ww][Ss][Hh]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Rr][Ee][Gg][Ss][Vv][Rr]32\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Rr][Uu][Nn][Dd][Ll][Ll]32\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm][Ii][Nn][Ff][Oo]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Hh][Oo][Aa][Mm][Ii]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Ww][Ss][Cc][Rr][Ii][Pp][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/))
